title: Raceday Countdown Does Not Refresh After Event Creation (Fixed: Aug 11, 2025) - v2.0.8
resolution: The `updateRacedayCountdown()` function was not being called after a new event was successfully created. This has been added to the 'Add Event' form's success handler in `schedule.js`. Additionally, a UI flicker was resolved by hiding the countdown elements by default in the HTML.

title: Edit Event Modal Save Button Inoperative (Fixed: Aug 10, 2025) - v1.9.6
resolution: The 'Edit Event' modal was missing the multi-select dropdown for checklists, which caused the JavaScript to fail. The missing HTML element has been added, and the associated event listeners in `schedule.js` now function correctly.
